name: Ju Fufu
agent_background:
Ju Fufu, a rare tiger Thiren of New Eridu. She looks small and is still young, but she's the most senior disciple of Suibian Temple and one of Yixuan's first disciples.

"Able to deal with anything," "can even make Shifu listen," "super patient and meticulous teacher," "has great taste when choosing restaurants for teambuilding."
—Yunkui Summit trainee performance review, peer evaluation

"Always messing up the tasks given by Shifu," "doesn't command respect in speech or combat," "doesn't know how to act tough against bad guys," "juniors are more skilled."
—Yunkui Summit trainee performance review, self-evaluation

"'The most skilled senior ever who can do anything, a righteous hero with righteous might' is what I heard her say when I passed by her room. Hm... I concur."
—Yunkui Summit trainee performance review, Shifu's evaluation

basic_attack.name: Tiger Seven Forms - Flaming Claw
basic_attack.description:
Slash forward up to four times, dealing Physical DMG and Fire DMG
During the 3rd hit, repeatedly press to maintain the combo and keep striking the enemy.
During the 3rd hit, hold or pause before pressing to chaininto the 4th hit.
During the 3rd hit, Anti-Interrupt Level is increased, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

basic_attack.name: Hu Wei
basic_attack.description:
During combat, Hu Wei will automatically attack enemies, dealing Fire DMG
Upon hitting an enemy, gain 20 points of Might, triggering up to once per use of a skill. The maximum for Might is 200.

dodge.name: Dodge: Tiger
dodge.description:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Tiger Seven Forms - Tiger Charge
dash_attack.description: Perform a quick slash forward, dealing Physical DMG.

dash_attack.name: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain King's Game
dash_attack.description:
After using Dash Attack: Tiger Seven Forms - Tiger Charge, hold [Basic Attack] to activate:
Enter a high-speed spinning state. While in this state, use the joystick to move and deal Physical DMG upon contact with enemies.
After Ju Fufu gains Momentum from other skills, she will be surrounded by flames in the high-speed spinning state. Upon contact with enemies, 1 point of Momentum is consumed, changing the DMG to Fire DMG and granting 25 points of Might. The maximum for Momentum is 15.
When dealing Fire DMG, if Might is above 100 points, 100 points of
Might will be automatically consumed to trigger Chain Attack:
Suppressing Tiger Cauldron.
Releasing [Basic Attack] will have Ju Fufu exit the spinning state and throw Hu Wei to attack enemies. When switching to another character,
Ju Fufu will remain in the spinning state and attempt to collide with the nearest enemy.
While Ju Fufu is the currently active character, DMG taken during the skill is reduced by 40%, and Anti-Interrupt Level is increased. If not the active character, she becomes invulnerable.

dodge_counter.name: Tiger Seven Forms - Reignited Mountain
dodge_counter.description:
Perform multiple slashes on enemies ahead, dealing Fire DMG
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

quick_assist.name: Decisive Stomp
quick_assist.description:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

defensive_assist.name: Steadfast Crouching Tiger
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Feral Blazing Maw
assist_follow_up.description:
Slash forward at enemies, then use Hu Wei to follow up with a downward attack, dealing Fire DMG.
Gain 1 point of Momentum upon activation at most once every 10s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Tiger Seven Forms - Mountain-Descending Tiger
special_attack.description:
Perform a spinning slash forward, followed by a falling slash, ealing Fire DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Tiger Seven Forms Alt - Mountain-Descending Savage Tiger
ex_special_attack.description:
Swing Hu Wei forward for a powerful strike, dealing massive Fire DMG
Upon activation, gain 3 points of Momentum and 80 points of Might.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

chain_attack.name: Tiger Cauldron Collapse
chain_attack.description:
Swing Hu Wei to deliver a powerful strike to enemies in a small area ahead, dealing massive Fire DMG
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

chain_attack.name: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron
chain_attack.description:
With at least 100 points of Might, after triggering a Chain Attack, automatically activate:
Consume 100 Might to open Hu Wei and fire flames and popcorn at enemies, striking them in a small area ahead, dealing massive Fire DMG
If Momentum is available, and while not the active character, Fiery Spin will activate after the skill ends.
This is an Aftershock. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Tiger Seven Forms - Raging Tiger Explosion
ultimate.description:
Perform two downward attacks with Hu Wei, dealing massive Fire DMG
Upon activation, gain 6 points of Momentum and 100 points of Might.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core_passive.name: Fu-rocious Might
core_passive.description:
When Ju Fufu has yet to use Hu Wei, it will automatically attack enemies and gain Might upon hitting them.
When Hu Wei hits an enemy and has at least 100 Might, and Ju Fufu is not the currently active character, Ju Fufu will launch Chain Attack: Suppressing Tiger Cauldron centered around the target enemy. Upon activation, all squad members gain the Tiger's Roar effect: CRIT DMG increases by 20%, and when Ju Fufu's initial ATK is greater than or equal to 2,800, every additional 100 ATK further increases CRIT DMG by 5%, up to a maximum additional increase of 30%.
While in the Tiger's Roar state, character Chain Attack/Ultimate DMG increases by 20%/40%.
The Tiger's Roar state lasts for 30s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. While Ju Fufu is in the Tiger's Roar state, Impact increases by 50.

additional_ability.name: Ability: Aura of Authority
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad is an Attack or Rupture character:
The maximum Decibels for all characters in the squad increases by 1,000. When an Attack or Rupture character uses an Ultimate, that character gains 300 Decibels.

mindscape_cinema.name: Super Scary Little Tiger
mindscape_cinema.description: Upon entering combat, Ju Fufu's CRIT Rate increases by 12%, and she immediately gains 100 Might. When Ju Fufu's Chain Attack hits an enemy, when the target is Stunned, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%, lasting for 30s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Almighty Qingming Warrior
mindscape_cinema.description:
While in the Tiger's Roar state, character CRIT DMG increases by an additional 22%.
Whenever any character activates an Ultimate, Ju Fufu gains 3 points of Momentum.

mindscape_cinema.name: Righteous Young Hero
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Monster-Slaying Tiger Mystic
mindscape_cinema.description: While Ju Fufu is in the Tiger's Roar state, her CRIT DMG increases by 35%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Unrivaled Almighty Senior
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Roar of My Inner Tiger
mindscape_cinema.description:
Ju Fufu's Chain Attack DMG increases by 30%.
Upon consuming Momentum and hitting an enemy in the high-speed spinning state, fire 3 popcorns, each dealing 160% of Fufu's ATK as DMG. This DMG is treated as Chain Attack DMG.
